results.content: Explanations are unclear and often nonexistent. He doesn't tell you what he's doing, just repeats what's already on the screen but doesn't clarify any concepts. Frequent grammatical errors and misspellings in the text, which are distracting and speak to the sloppiness of the instructor. Some lessons are taught by his brother, which would be okay except that the brother is even worse at teaching than he is. Awful course, would not recommend to anyone. Save your money and look elsewhere.
